about.description: I am a Frontend Developer with 2+ years of experience, including both commercial development and academic projects. During this time, I have mastered and successfully applied technologies such as React, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, as well as libraries and frameworks like Vite, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I have worked on projects ranging from creating complex landing pages and e-commerce platforms to social applications, which has significantly strengthened my skills in UI/UX and API integration. Moving forward, I plan to deepen my expertise in building complex interfaces using modern approaches such as Server-side Rendering (SSR), while also progressing towards FullStack development with a focus on integrating React with microservices. I am open to Frontend Developer positions, primarily working with React, TypeScript, Redux, NextJS, and Vite.

experience.header1: WHAT I HAVE DONE SO FAR

job1.title: Middle Web Developer
job1.about: Media buying agency specializing in purchasing traffic on social networks.

description.point1: Responsive Layout and Design: Developed and refined layouts for various devices, ensuring cross-browser and cross-platform compatibility.
description.point2: API Development and Integration: Created and integrated APIs to ensure proper functionality of web applications.
description.point3: Bug Fixes and Code Optimization: Identified and resolved defects, improving the overall user experience by eliminating technical errors.
description.point4: Form Optimization and Enhancement: Enhanced form functionality, including [Implementation of a carousel in the form, Integration of interactive elements (doors, gifts, time, and date), and Development of an anti-duplication script for forms].
description.point5: HTML, CSS, JS Development: Collaborated closely with the development team to enhance web application performance.
description.point6: Content Localization: Reviewed and adapted pre-landing and landing pages for Arabic-speaking users.

job2.title: Java Developer
job2.about: Specializing in the development of software solutions for businesses, especially in the financial sector. The company's main product is <Remit Flow>, designed for exchange offices and money transfers.

description.point1: Participated in all stages of software development: design, implementation, deployment, and support..
description.point2: Analyzed requirements and contributed to achieving business goals.
description.point3: Developed and maintained Java/Java EE applications with a focus on optimization and scalability.
description.point4: Collaborated with teams to ensure quality and meet deadlines.
description.point5: Coordinated with various departments (analytics, DevOps, support) to ensure smooth system operation and successful solution implementation.
description.point6: Prepared technical documentation and provided user guidance.

job3.title: Technical Support Specialist
job3.about: IT services company. Provides domain registration, hosting, web design and development, and also offers accounting systems and technical support.

description.point1: Troubleshooting and resolving software and hardware issues.
description.point2: Diagnosing and fixing technical problems, including account setup and network configuration.
description.point3: Following up with clients to ensure full functionality of their IT systems after issue resolution.
